content: He is currently a final-year Ph.D. student in the Research School of Computing, The Australian National University. On the one hand, he is interested in many deep learning topics, particularly video understanding and generation. On the other hand, he is an active full-stack web developer. He is currently doing a research project supervised by Professor Stephen Gould, Dr. Anoop Cherian, Dr. Yizhak Ben-Shabat, and Dr. Cristian Rodriguez. Before that, in 2021, he received his bachelorâ€™s degree in Advanced Computing (honours) and Computer Science and Technology from The Australian National University and Shandong University respectively.
summary: He is currently a final-year Ph.D. student in the Research School of Computing, The Australian National University. On the one hand, he is interested in many deep learning topics, particularly video understanding and generation.
title: Jiahao Zhang

summary: A Chrome/Edge extension to help you quickly scan through the flood of daily ArXiv papers.
title: ArXiv Toolkit

summary: We present Pos3R, a training-free method for estimating the 6D pose of any object from a single RGB image by leveraging a 3D foundation model, eliminating the need for pose supervision or task-specific training.
title: Pos3R: 6D Pose Estimation for Unseen Objects Made Easy

summary: Official implementation of Manual-PA: Learning 3D Part Assembly from Instruction Diagrams.
title: Manual-PA

summary: Official implementation of WACV 2025 Temporal Instructional Diagram Grounding in Unconstrained Videos.
title: TDGV

summary: We introduce Manual-PA, a transformer-based framework that leverages diagrammatic assembly manuals to guide both the selection and 6D pose estimation of furniture parts, enabling efficient and realistic 3D assembly by aligning parts with instructional illustrations.
title: Manual-PA: Learning 3D Part Assembly from Instruction Diagrams

summary: We introduce a new approach to simultaneously localize a sequence of instructional diagrams in videos by modeling their mutual relationships and temporal order, rather than handling each step independently.
title: Temporally Grounding Instructional Diagrams in Unconstrained Videos

summary: Official implementation of CVPR 2023 Aligning Step-by-Step Instructional Diagrams to Video Demonstrations.
title: Assembly Video Manual Alignment

summary: A frontend project to introduce the IAW dataset.
title: Homepage for Ikea Assembly In the Wild (IAW) dataset

summary: A template for simple deep learning projects using Lightning.
title: Pytorch Lightning Template

content: Acknowledgements Jiahao Zhang is supported by an ANU-MERL PhD scholarship agreement. Yizhak Ben-Shabat is Supported by the Marie Sklodowska-Curie grant agreement No. 893465. Stephen Gould is supported by an ARC Future Fellowship No. FT200100421.
summary: We introduce a new framework and dataset (IAW) for aligning assembly diagrams from instruction manuals with real-world video segments, enabling cross-modal retrieval and step-level alignment between illustrated instructions and assembly actions in videos.
title: Aligning Step-by-Step Instructional Diagrams to Video Demonstrations

summary: GoferBot is a novel assembly system that seamlessly integrates all sub-modules by utilising implicit semantic information purely from visual perception.
title: GoferBot: A Visual Guided Human-Robot Collaborative Assembly System

summary: SDU Research CMS.
title: SDU Research Management System

summary: Institutional Publication Metrics for Computer Science.
title: CSMetrics

summary: Influence flower visualizes citation influences among academic entities, including papers, authors, institutions, and research topics.
title: Influence Flower

summary: Official website of SlimeVerse.
title: SlimeVerse

summary: An in-browser video annotation tool developed by ANU CVML.
title: Vidat

summary: An encoder(Resnet152)-decoder(LSTM) implementation of image caption model.
title: Image Caption Generator

summary: A plugin Manager based on Cpp Micro Service.
title: Plugin Manager

summary: An enterprise-level business projects(CMS for construction companies).
title: Weihai Construction Consulting System

summary: A booking system designed for school.
title: School Booking System

summary: Virtual Judge for ACM practice.
title: Virtual Judge
